Name: NEE
Comments: King et al.( inventory atmospheric flow approach for 2000-09) ; note maybe inconsistent with some atm flows given below

Name: Land use change
Comments: SOCCR (here LUC is defined by agricultiral soil C balance + woody encroachement)

Name: Wood product decay
Comments: Landfills wood products SOCCR p91 - note : inconsistent with  production (SOCCR p110) -export - wood product storage (King pers. Com - email 2013) = 128 - 61 - 68 = -1 Tg C ; note  forest harvest removal 165 TgC  (Hayes et al. Table 6.6)

Name: Crop product consumption
Comments: SOCCR p88 for crop production (217) + SOCCR crop trade (net export of 35) ; note  domestic crop harvest 217 TgC (SOCCR p88)

Name: Soil C export
Comments: Mass balance (ignoring burial -SOCCR p 36 reports burial = 20)

Name: Freshwater outgasing
Comments: Turner et al. - Butmann and Raymond (US only) = 97

Name: Fire
Type: source (neutral - most of these fires are recycled by agricutural activities)

Name: Wood product decay
Comments: Peters (7,6 - 0,8 +2,8) x decay function from Earles

Name: Wood product decay
Comments: Peters (25,5 - 8,5+25,2 ) x decay function from Earles

Name: NEE
Comments: LUC-NPP+RH+Fire+ Wood product decay+ Crop product consumption+Freshwater outgassing

Name: Wood product decay
Comments: Peters (22,1 - 14,5 +1,8 ) x decay function from Earles

Name: NEE
Comments: LUC-NPP+RH+Fire [+ DEC + insect + consumption plant product in tab 2]+Freshwater outgassing

Name: Fire
Comments: iiasa LEA -Dolman ; note additional Disturbance (tab 2) 207 and insect (tab 2) 51

Name: Crop product consumption
Comments: Dolman table 2 ; harvested plant produc minus wood product (check if this contains grazed and forage grass harvest)

Name: Freshwater outgasing
Comments: raymond et al. [ Note Dolman table 2 = 11.8 ]

Name: NEE
Comments: LUC-NPP+RH+Fire+ Wood product decay+ Crop product consumption+Freshwater outgassing

Name: NPP
Comments: sum of all land use Schulze et al. GCB

Name: Soil Heterotrophic Respiration
Comments: sum of all land use Schulze et al. GCB

Name: Soil C export
Comments: mass balance from luyssaert (assuming no burial)

Name: NPP
Comments: van der werf et al. GCB 2003 from CASA model ; need better estimate ?

Name: Fire
Comments: van der werf et al. GCB 2003 ; does not separate deforestation fires, so double counting with LUC

Name: Wood product decay
Comments: Peters (37,9 - 9,3 +1) x decay function from Earles

Name: NEE
Comments: LUC-NPP+RH+Fire+ Wood product decay+[ livestock consumption 2] + Crop product consumption+Freshwater outgassing

Name: NEE
Comments: LUC-NPP+RH+Fire+ Wood product decay+ Crop product consumption+Freshwater outgassing

Name: Fire
Type: source (close to neutral for net - most of these fires are savannas fires - regrowth included in NPP)

Name: Wood product decay
Comments: Peters (18,6 -4,1 +2,6) x decay function from Earles

Name: Fossil fuel CO2 emissions
Comments: note + Need to add Middle East region (global fossil fuel CO2 emissions from Lequéré et al. (7.8 ± 0.4) during 2000-2009)
